item.description:
America’s secular demographic – atheists, agnostics, humanists, and nonbelievers of all types – is growing rapidly, and these seculars are organizing into an important social and political movement. Join us on Thursday, October 25, at 5 p.m., as David Niose, president of the American Humanist Association and author of Nonbeliever Nation: The Rise of Secular Americans, discusses this movement and the emergence of the secular demographic.

For more information contact ssomit [at] mit.edu.
item.name: SSOMIT presents David Niose: "The Rise of Secular Americans"
